value.title: Director
value.description:
### About Us

The less you know about us, the better.

### The Role

Our director was recently fired/terminated -- found/announced with Service
Weapon in hand. Pick it up, and start the most rigorous interview/fight you've
ever encountered.

We need a _lot_ of things right now, but nothing is more urgent than finding
someone to keep the lights on.

value.title: Janitor's Assistant
value.description:
### About Us

The less you know about us, the better.

### The Role

There are a _lot_ of inscrutable parts of the Oldest House, but the Janitor is
the most confounding of all.

He is one of the most essential parts of this Bureau. He *understands* this
place in ways no one else is capable of. But like the House itself, we need
someone who can decipher him.

We're looking for an extra set of hands who's good at interfacing with non-native
English speakers and neurodivergence, and can do it in an environment that's
regularly shifting, to help us keep our House in order. Don't worry about the
rest -- he'll get you through navigating the House as long as you can navigate him.

Bonus points if you're *really* good at fixing clogs, or if you speak Finnish.

value.title: Head of Research
value.description:
### About Us

The less you know about us, the better.

### The Role

üéµ db4, gb4, bb4 üéµ

Our head of research left behind _lots_ of video footage describing what's been happening in the Bureau, but not much about his own whereabouts...

Continue his work...

Make fun videos! ship the crew!
Test music for the paranormal (We have a killer sound system)
Play with rocks!

You'll have all the resources you could possibly need to chase your wildest ideas.

And other people's.

value.title: Head of Communications
value.description:
### About Us

The less you know about us, the better.

### The Role

After what Research found, the Bureau has seen a need to restructure our leadership team.

The rest of this description is *your* job.

value.title: Head of Security
value.description:
### About Us

The less you know about us, the better.

### The Role

We need a new Head of Security to improve our containment facility.

You'll need a clearance to find out more.

value.title: Ranger
value.description:
### About Us

The less you know about us, the better.

### The Role

Venture into the weird and unexplained. And also, somehow, the same hotel. A lot.

value.title: CEO
value.description:
### About Us

An ambitious, misunderstood delivery company imbued with the sleek, dazzling veneer of the 1980s

### The Role

Our CEO is so incompetent that the company's "revenue" for a year was an $8 bank error in our favor.

Also, he hates cats.

We need someone to come right this ship before it crashes. *Again.*

Our health plan covers bone-itis!

value.title: Ship Captain
value.description:
### About Us

An ambitious, misunderstood delivery company imbued with the sleek, dazzling veneer of the 1980s

### The Role

Are you a born leader?

Then good news! We need one of those!

Specifically, one who can manage the day-to-day operations on our delivery jobs.

Must-have skills include piloting, martial arts and preventing mutinies.

value.title: Delivery Boy
value.description:
### About Us

An ambitious, misunderstood delivery company imbued with the sleek, dazzling veneer of the 1980s

### The Role

Do you like space? Do you want to visit distant planets, and go on adventures?

Then good news!

Come work at PlanEx, where you'll have new places to go every day! Places that
need packages!

We're currently staffing up an entire crew, so we have multiple openings.

value.title: Bureaucrat
value.description:
### About Us

An ambitious, misunderstood delivery company imbued with the sleek, dazzling veneer of the 1980s

### The Role

Our last bureaucrat recently went off to requisition his groove back.

Do you like filing? Managing money? Managing *people*?

(...should I have started with "firing"?)

Come help us organize! (Our cabinets, not our employees.)

value.title: Nimbus Crew
value.company: Democratic Order of Planets -- Earth Military
value.description:
### About Us

We're the DOOP!

### The Role

Do you like glory? How about blazes of it?

Come join the crew of the most glorious ship in the Earth military -- the Nimbus.

Under the tutelage of Zapp Brannigan, you'll become the best men that you can. You'll be lucky to know him -however short of a time that might be.

value.title: Assembly Line Inspector
value.description:
### About Us

Here at MomCorp, we strive to pamper our employees like they were Mom's own children.

Remember: at MomCorp, we're family. ‚ù§Ô∏è

### The Role

Like the emptying of any nest, even our *best* employees eventually leave us to venture off to something new. But that's how we find room for new talent to nurture! And that's where you come in.

You'll be the extension of Mom's loving arms that carefully inspect every robot produced by Mom's Friendly Robot Company, to make sure they'll make all of our customers' lives better.

value.title: Mayor
value.description:
### About Us

Not much to say, really. Just a normal city -- certainly not the kind where anything *weird* happens.

### The Role

Our last mayor had a corruption scandal, so you should join the race to rebuild the destruction he left in his wake.

Campaigning in this town is unique -you'll see more coalitions spring up over highly specific causes than you've ever encountered before. The causes themselves might also surprise you.

value.title: High School Principal
value.description:
### About Us

Not much to say, really. Just a normal city -- certainly not the kind where anything *weird* happens.

### The Role

Our schools are... challenging, and our previous principals haven't lasted very long. We're hoping you'll do better.

The requirements aren't out of line with anything normal for this job -it's just *really* important that no one has ever called you "edible."

Or maybe it's important that someone *has.* Maybe it works... backwards? We don't know yet. Help us figure that out!

value.title: Police Officer
value.description:
### About Us

Not much to say, really. Just a normal city -- certainly not the kind where anything *weird* happens.

### The Role

Do you like action? Do you need excitement in your life? Come work at the Sunnydale PD! This is a fast-paced environment where you'll never run out of something new to do.

You'll also learn a lot about what is and isn't related to gangs doing PCP.

Beware: this isn't your average everyday danger. This is *advanced* danger.

Benefits include AD&D insurance and on-site grief counselors.

Be my deputy!

value.title: Cashier
value.description:
### About Us

We make Krabby Patties!

### The Role

Ahoy! Me staff is on strike -- they owe me money and walked out instead of
paying up, so I need to find some teenagers to work for cheap so I can keep me
ship afloat.

Man the register! Withstand the anchovies! Count me money!

value.title: Fry Cook
value.description:
### About Us

We make Krabby Patties!

### The Role

Ahoy! Me staff is on strike -- they owe me money and walked out instead of
paying up, so I need to find some teenagers to work for cheap so I can keep me
ship afloat.

Sling Hash! Sling Patties! Outpace the anchovies!

value.title: Brett
value.company: The Spy/Detective Agency Formerly Known as ISIS
value.description:
### About Us

...Who even posted this here? We're not supposed to be *online!* CHERYL!

### The Role

Do you have a propensity for attracting every stray ping pong ball, no matter how improbable? Do you have a surprising capacity to recover from serious injury? Is your name Brett?

Come join us at... we're still working on the name. That whole thing really caught us out of nowhere.

Don't ask about what happened to our last Brett.

campaigns.name: Dev
defaultInterviewQuestions: First of all, how dare you?

coverLetters.name: Breadcrumb
coverLetters.text: I found this by building crawlers to doomscroll job boards for me! Check out the writeup linked in my resume, or better yet feel incredibly free to just ask me more about it sometime üßë‚Äçüíªüòé
